name: voxify-bot
description: Revolutionize your Discord server with seamless voice channel management. Multilingual support, blazing speed, and advanced features for an unparalleled user experience.

scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm --prefix dist/ start NODE_ENV=development
scripts.buildClean: npm run build:clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:copy-files && npm run build:install-dependencies
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:copy-files && cp -r -n node_modules dist/node_modules || true
scripts.build:min: npm run build && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:copy-files: cp package.json ./dist/package.json && cp package-lock.json ./dist/package-lock.json  && npm run build:copy-env
scripts.build:copy-env: npm run build:copy-env-example && npm run build:copy-env-dist

author: VoxifyDevelopment <contact@voxify.dev>
